    • Constructor Detail

      • DcMotorServo

        public DcMotorServo(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor motor,
                    com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.AnalogInput potentiometer,
                    IConfig config)
        Creates a DcMotorServo object which is a motor that acts as a servo
        Parameters:
        motor - the DcMotor that will be used
        potentiometer - the potentiometer that will measure the motor
        config - the config to use
        See Also:
        DcMotor, AnalogInput, IConfig
